A_SOFTWARE.text: Do you want recurring subscription revenue?
Is your main value data/insights rather than functionality?

A_PLATFORM.text: Where do you mainly earn revenue?

A_HARDWARE.text: Do you plan to keep ownership of the hardware and sell service/usage instead?
Is long-term maintenance or monitoring part of your offer?

A_IMPACT.text: Is your impact primarily environmental (e.g. carbon, waste, energy)?
Do you expect to measure and verify your impact for external stakeholders?

A_FINANCE.text: Do you primarily enable other projects by providing capital or de-risking?
Will you manage a portfolio of projects or focus on single deals?
